description:
Speaker: Dan Callahan

Compared to native apps, mobile websites are at a disadvantage: no installing, no push notifications, and they only work when you're online. This year, that changes.

Browser vendors are working together to implement open standards that address each of these shortcomings. This session examines how the Service Worker, Push, and App Manifest specifications fill the gap between web and native.

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2016 and https://github.com/PyCon/2016-slides
title: Dan Callahan - The New Mobile Web: Service Worker, Push, and App Manifests - PyCon 2016
